website_summaries.verdict: The Acer Chromebook 14 gives you just about all the features and quality you need from a basic laptop, plus extra niceties like a metal body and almost 12 hours of battery life.

For the business user who needs all-day battery life and MIL-SPEC–tested durability, the Acer Chromebook 14 for Work is one of the more powerful Chrome OS laptops we've seen. Its price, however, is firmly in Windows-laptop territory.
pros: Core i5 processor and 8GB of memory deliver solid performance
Good selection of ports, including USB Type-C
cons: Top lid is prone to fingerprints

customer_reviews.title: 14 Chromebook Acer Full HD 1080 screen in Gold
customer_reviews.text: Ive always had a Windows laptop, but got so fedup with the constant windows updates and the slow startup. I use a Google Pixel Tablet so decided on a Chromebook. This is so easy, from installing a USB printer to adding Apps. Battery lasts all day, and the whole look is quality, full aluminium case, and anti glare screen it so good.. Startup in seconds rather than 20 minutes (Windows)
customer_reviews.author: oldrocker

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed, worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I have been pleasantly surprised with my Acer Chromebook, quality kit at a very reasonable price. Excellent matt screen, good speakers, excellent battery life. Despite some reviews saying it isn't compatible with Microsoft Office I'm up and running with Word, Powerpoint and Excel. Setting up my wireless printer was simple too. The OS has taken a while to get the hang of, but youtube is awash with guidance. I'd have liked an sd slot, but that's a minor gripe. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: R. MCGINLEY

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye Windows laptops .
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is absolutely brilliant, I ditched my Windows 10 laptop for this chromebook, I wish I had done it sooner, chromebooks are so awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Jarbo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A good laptop/chromebook for daily use. U can do everything with it soon also MS OFFICE...GREAT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kurnia Gusti

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent connectivity, amazing build, the battery life is around 7 hours on streaming.
customer_reviews.author: Mihai

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for my sister high school not good for professional use
customer_reviews.text: Thought to be a laptop but ended having an android device with keyboard. Not good for professional use but good for kids or recreational use. Microsoft programs and other pc programs won't run ot the laptop. Desktop not available and really poor resolution of picture (can't see this HD at all) with some colour differing from its original version. As I said only good for students/kids/chill not for other things
customer_reviews.author: Brave

customer_reviews.title: Lovely chromebook
customer_reviews.text: Really nice soft gold colour, lightweight and thin. Replaced an old HP chromebook so I'm used to it. Unfortunately there are still some things that don't work with chrome such as updating the maps on my tomtom. I have to borrow someone elses windows laptop for that, which is a shame, but mostly I love the ease of use of a chromebook and everything is saved in the cloud. Also no worries about viruses. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: obiblooze

customer_reviews.title: It's not a laptop - Its an Android Tablet in Laptop Form
customer_reviews.text: I think it's important to get this straight right away. This looks like a laptop but it isn't. You can't install PC games or the like, just APPs like on your phone from the Google Play Store. This instantly limits you, if you're thinking about playing GTA, Destiny or Football Manager in its full form you are in for a shock.. This is why Chromebooks are so cheap, there is little you can do on one that you can't experience on an android tablet.. The recent adverts about laptops experiencing viruses while the Chromebook doesn't are misleading and laughable. Its like comparing a PC to an IMAC. At least Chromebooks are cheap..
customer_reviews.author: DjSteveyG

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but super slow to load webpages
customer_reviews.text: Great looking Macbook Air style Chromebook and very light but the problem is it is extremely slow loading anything, especially on Facebook Web page. So I returned it and bought a used 2013 Macbook Air for about the same price and it's lightening fast in comparison. If a Chromebook doesn't have at least an Intel core i3 chip it's not worth getting
customer_reviews.author: Chris L.

customer_reviews.title: Very simple setup and operation. Great built in tools with good security and auto update
customer_reviews.text: Bought for Company specific work. Simple setup. Very fast startup and shutdown. The standard google office app tools and google drive make working across devices easy.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D. A. Sandison

customer_reviews.title: Quality Item but check operating system
customer_reviews.text: Not used it myself bought for my wife. She found the Google operating system difficult to use at first says she is OK with it now. Overall she is quite impressed with the item the keyboard, picture quality and sound are very good, but you do need to invest in a quality carry case. Had it 4 months now so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: lloyd reid

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful looking machine and wellmade
customer_reviews.text: Now we come to the bad bit. Google I find the chromebook system messy and unreliable. I hate all this signing in all the time and system lock. I love the long battery life and the quick response when the lid is raised but I'm certainly not a convert
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: Used to have an apple Mac which looked identical in gold until it was stolen from me, couldn't afford the £1200 replacement cost so got this. Same great build quality and less buggy and slow. Absolutely brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: Phaeton

customer_reviews.title: Lovely colour
customer_reviews.text: Great machine but have to press twice to turn on. Sometimes closes program for no reason
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Well know brand
customer_reviews.text: I liked the size and weigh but was disappointed with the lack of an SD card slot. Not all of us use streaming.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Good value for money. I've been stuck on Chromebooks for a while now, but this is the best one I've invested in so far.
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's great. Looks like a much more expensive laptop. Great audio.
customer_reviews.author: Franck Hennessy

customer_reviews.title: Solid purchase
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Excellent battery life, light and compact, great screen for watching Youtube/Netflix, fast, great value. Cons: Keyboard is only average, trackpad is lacking, the limitations of ChromeOS won't suit everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it its great for work love the colour great price to.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Marie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quick start up
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quick start up.. its started soon as you open the lid wished I'd of got one ages ago
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting, solid laptop
customer_reviews.text: Just what I want, had this for 3-4 years now. Still very long battery life. Still very fast and nice to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good laptop
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use lightweight laptop. Only criticism is that it doesn't work well with the playstore.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Amazing budget laptop
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my Chromebook. It does everything I need it to, quickly, with great battery life, and at an affordable price. What's not to love?
customer_reviews.author: Alex Thorpe

customer_reviews.title: Great battery & lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Use it to work from home occasionally. Great battery on it, no need to charge it every time. Quick to start & shutdown & lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: Striuggling with the mouse pad as used to a hand version.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A really good buy, I would highly recommend this Chromebook.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My chromebook
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with my new chromebook. It performs really well and is perfect for my study and for movie nights. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Fed up with my Windows laptop becoming slower and constantly having updates many of which needed a restart I bought this Acer Chromebook and am delighted. Why? Because it performs well in every respect, fast to start, fast displaying web pages, long battery life, fast to recharge. Of course, it doesn't run Windows programs but I'm using Google Docs instead of Word and Google Sheets instead of Excel, no problem, indeed I like it like that you never have to save. Only issue has been that printing to my old (and therefore not Cloud Ready) wireless Canon printer can only be achieved via my Windows laptop and therefore there is a significant delay.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Greaves

customer_reviews.title: So far, loving this product.
customer_reviews.text: Three months in, and I am still very pleased with this product. After years of using Apple products, I have been really pleasantly surprised with this Chrome book. It starts up very quickly, it is not heavy, it charges quickly too. I like the size of the keyboard and the fact that I can rest my wrists on it. All google docs can be set up in advance to work off line too, so they can be used without the internet connection. So far, really pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: SHAUN LAMB

customer_reviews.title: Acer wins again
customer_reviews.text: Very nice chromebook (I update mine every year) and this is the best yet. Lovely colour and fast delivery. Great
customer_reviews.author: ChrissieD

customer_reviews.title: Best Chromebook laptop in the UK
customer_reviews.text: After lots of research I decided to go for a laptop replacement rather than a 2 in 1. The reason this is the best one in my opinion is the screen quality. It's full hd and really clear. 14 inch is plenty big enough for me. 8 hours battery life is accurate.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good (but not always easy)
customer_reviews.text: It looks great, cheap, light weight, good resolution, keyboard is nice to type on and sound is good, battery life is really good! Doesn’t overheat at all & loads up fast. Downsides are that there are certain keys missing so had to learn other shortcuts for them & you can’t download Microsoft office or some other things on to it because it isn’t compatible. Only if they have an app for it or an online server can you use them and these are not as easy to navigate (eg: online Microsoft word) which is annoying for university work Would recommend for the price, just takes getting used to.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Primmett

customer_reviews.title: Excellent crome book
customer_reviews.text: Excellent crome book. Would prefer brighter screen but for the money this is good entry level machine for my kids. Good keyboard, premium styling, makes it appearance seem way better than whats inside. Battery life is acceptable for surfing youtube for long periods. No complaints with build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M. A. Isaac

customer_reviews.title: The design is simply amazing, looks almost and is as light as a ...
customer_reviews.text: The design is simply amazing, looks almost and is as light as a MAcbook but a cheaper price. Good screen quality and definition. There are sometimes problems when it comes to internet connection to some websites, since the system is extremely secure and blocks every threat. Would totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Unsatisfied coustumer

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and stylish (like a MacBook Air)
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife's Christmas so she doesn't keep nicking my Windows laptop.Very impressed with the overall look and feel - compact, slim, sturdy and stylish (like a MacBook Air). Boots in seconds. No sound from fans or disk drives. Gold case is very smart. Time will tell if Chrome OS suits her use case, but everything seems perfect so far.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Middleton

customer_reviews.title: Chromebook delight.
customer_reviews.text: Delighted when unpacked the box, so elegant sleek and light! Plugged in & switched on and was set up in moments and away. Fast and responsive. Such a delight after buying an new hp windows 10 laptop which has driven me mad with its slownness and now sits unused in a corner a waste of money. No more microsoft windows for me!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Palmer

customer_reviews.title: I bought this only because my Mac was broken. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this only because my Mac was broken... if you don't know the Chromebook system, well... you will struggle a bit. I would not buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Very bad performance.
customer_reviews.text: Under powered. Complicated web apps are very slow (e.g. zoopla.co.uk). Build quality is good, but nothing more than that.
customer_reviews.author: Nikos

customer_reviews.title: Apart from the looks everything else is not good. Slow performance keyboard and touchpad not very good
customer_reviews.text: I have one am returning. Please do not buy this chromebook. Apart from the looks everything else is not good. Slow performance keyboard and touchpad not very good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Completely false specification. Junk.
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT as described. Not 4G RAM and 32G eMMC - it's 2G and 16G. Not a quad core processor but a dual core. Slower and much less responsive than my old C720. Not an "all metal case" - the lid is plastic. "Luxury Gold" is kinda pink. One star for showing up. It's going back. Just say no.
customer_reviews.author: Chuffed

customer_reviews.title: It’s internet based so nothin works without internet
customer_reviews.text: Why is my product freezing already!? Telling me I can not connect to my internet that I used daily!? This isn’t a purchase is would advice anyone to get. I restart the item and this is how it came about in the middle of my course work that is due in 3 days!!!! This is a mess. I bought this laptop just over a month ago and it’s already playing up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: This was for my grandson and he is happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Butcher

product_meta.title: Acer Chromebook 14 CB3-431 - (Intel Celeron N3160, 4GB RAM, 32GB eMMC, 14 inch FHD Display, Google Chrome OS, Gold)
product_meta.description:
Acer Chromebook CB3-431-C4RC 35.56 inch Notebook (Intel, 4 GB RAM, Chrome OS) - Gold.

The Acer Chromebook 14 has everything you’d expect and then gives you more. For one thing, it’s completely encased in aluminum alloy. Then you get a bigger 14-inch anti-glare HD or Full HD screen, up to 12 hours of battery life and enhanced wireless speeds. And did we mention it’s absolutely stunning?

As thin, compact and light as the Chromebook 14 is, it still packs a bigger screen with your choice of HD or Full HD resolution, IPS technology and a low reflection anti-glare screen that altogether make for great viewing and productivity.

"All day"? Could mean a lot of things depending on who you talk to. We figure with up to 12 hours of battery operation, you’ll agree, whatever you call a day, we’ve got you covered.

BOX CONTAINS
Acer Chromebook 14
Power adapter
User documentation























BOX CONTAINS
Acer Chromebook 14
power adapter
user documentation
feature_bullets: All aluminium alloy housing - possessed of style, strength and durability, Chromebook 14 will go the distance and back again
As thin, compact and light as the Chromebook 14 is, it still packs a bigger screen with Full HD resolution, IPS technology and a low reflection anti-glare screen
The built-in webcam supports High Dynamic Range (HDR) imagining, which will improve your Google Hangouts experience
Enjoy fast wireless internet speeds with dual-band MIMO technology and 802.11ac technology

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars78 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
